random.line: I'm here to buy some gadgets. They just don't sell stuff like this in Yarl!
Yeah, they're pretty primitive. I see you eyeing the latest smartphone from Lemon.
I would buy it, but I have no idea how to use it.
Man, it's nice to have a break from the military. Even if it's just for an hour.
Yeah, it must be hard having no free time.
